member.name: ID2D1TessellationSink.AddTriangles
member.summary: Copies the specified triangles to the sink.
member.param: An array of structures that describe the triangles to add to the sink.
The number of triangles to copy from the triangles array.

member.name: ID2D1TessellationSink.Close
member.summary: Closes the sink and returns its error status.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
